title: Number of Amazon’s new holiday recruits equals population of Pasadena
description: Amazon is aiming to hire as many 150,000 extra workers across the U.S. for the holiday season, with sign-on bonuses of up to $3,000 offered in some locations.

title: Microsoft says disabling these two Windows 11 features will boost gaming performance
description: Microsoft has just announced that some of the settings in Windows 11 can slow down gaming performance. Here's how to disable them.

title: Amazon’s Scout robot appears to have made its last delivery
description: Amazon has announced it's ending field tests of its Scout delivery robot nearly four years after it unveiled the machine.
